website_summaries.verdict: High-quality conditioner is a favorite among most dog owners.
pros: Gentle formula moisturizes fur without washing off topical flea applications
Pleasant vanilla-almond scent keeps dogs smelling fresh for up to a week
Leaves fur soft and easy to tame
A little conditioner goes a long way
cons: Thick formula is tough to wash out, try diluting conditioner with water

customer_reviews.title: She Looks Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Earthbath products! I use the shampoo and conditioner for my poodle and she looks amazing after I groom her. Her hair is so soft and shiny and easy to blow out. The best thing about their products is that they are soap-free, which means it's less irritating. She doesn't scratch or bite herself after I bathe her. It really conditions well, but it washes out easily and doesn't weigh her hair down. I highly recommend it!

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful. Deeply hydrating and nourishing, smells really nice.

One tip that made is to much easier to use: I got a plastic bottle with a nozzle and a little lid, just like the ketchup bottles, watered it down a little bit, and can thus direct the bottle to the exact spot I need, with no waste. So much easier than the bulky bottle. Have done the same with all his shampoos and treatments.
